title: Senior Software Engineer
overview: A Senior Software Engineer position is available at Next Games, a Netflix Game Studio, where the focus is on creating fans-first interactive experiences by combining well-known movies and shows with engaging game mechanics. This role involves working on challenging technical tasks with modern cloud technologies and contributing to the development of a game server platform hosting millions of players. The ideal candidate should have experience in back-end development, knowledge of cloud technologies such as Kubernetes, and excellent C# programming and troubleshooting skills.
